message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially offering it at $2,300,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $2,300,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1,800,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  This product offers a unique value proposition that justifies a premium price.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $2,100,000.
I understand the value proposition of the product, but $2,100,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,900,000 for it.
Bob, I'm ready to make this work and have adjusted my price to reflect the value you'll gain.  My final offer is $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair and mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,850,000 for the product.
